QuestData.Title: Purge the Valley
QuestData.Description: Northwatch is a highly-defended stronghold southwest of here, across the harbor. It's a strategically-located stronghold that the Horde still struggles to overtake. We don't need the humans setting up another Northwatch here in Durotar.$b$bSweep through the valley to the west and slay these humans, $n. Let them know the power and the fury of Sen'jin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 12 Northwatch troops in Northwatch Foothold.
QuestData.RewardText: A battle well-fought, $c, but I still have my doubts about our effectiveness. These humans don't seem to be going anywhere.$b$bYou, however, have done more than could reasonably be asked of any loyal member of the Horde. Thank you.
